Package Server.Models

Class BillboardModel

java.lang.Object
Server.Models.BillboardModel
public class BillboardModel
extends java.lang.Object
Contains the data retrieval methods.

    • getBillboard

      public boolean getBillboard​(int billboardID)
      Fetches the specified billboard. It will populate the Billboard model object with the billboard data. This can then be accessed via the getter methods
      Parameters:
      billboardID - the billboard ID to retrieve
      Returns:
      true if the operation was successful, or false if no billboard was found

    • deleteBillboard

      public void deleteBillboard​(int billboardID)
      Deletes the specified billboard
      Parameters:
      billboardID - the id of the billboard to delete

    • listBillboards

      public org.w3c.dom.Document listBillboards()
      Retrieves a complete list of all billboards
      Returns:
      a Document object with the list of billboard objects contained in a root data element

    • createBillboard

      public int createBillboard​(int id, java.lang.String name, java.lang.String background, java.lang.String message, java.lang.String message_color, java.lang.String image, java.lang.String imageType, java.lang.String information, java.lang.String information_color, int owner)
      Creates a billboard with the provided information
      Parameters:
      background - a hex value representing the color of the background
      message - the billboard message
      message_color - the color of the message text
      image - the url or base64 data string of the image
      imageType - the type of image. The two valid options are: 'url' or 'data'
      information - in depth details about the billboard message
      information_color - the hex code for the information text color
      owner - the id of the user creating the billboard
      Returns:
      int representing the number of rows inserted
